text:
A
October 9,1961
Mr. Richard B.Hull
Director
Radio and TV Broadcasting
Ohio State University
215 West 19th Ave.
Columbus, Ohio
Dear Dick:
Re new chairman of JCEB, it looks as though Bob Andesson
(former director of SREB, now v,pAuburn), who is the
new ACE representative on the Council will be the choice.
I think he would be excellent; I donâ€™t think it would be
good to have anybody from the two operating broadcasting
agencies as chairman.
Cordially,
WGH/mmm
William G. Harley
